definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The additional complexity of an MVC application simply isn't warranted.
sentences.chinese: MVC應用法度額外的錯雜性則是無法包管的。

sentences.english: I will speak of your statutes before kings and will not be put to shame
sentences.chinese: 我也要在君王面前，論說你的法度，並不至於羞愧。

sentences.english: Grief dallied with nor law nor limit knows.
sentences.chinese: 痛苦若遭到玩忽，會凌越法度和界限。

sentences.english: It'll offer two phones both featuring Blackberry's exclusive push-mail application.
sentences.chinese: 拉入的兩款烏莓腳機具有獨有的電兒郵件拉支法度。

sentences.english: May those who fear you turn to me, those who understand your statutes.
sentences.chinese: 願敬畏你的人歸向我，他們就知道你的法度。

sentences.english: I have considered my ways and have turned my steps to your statutes.
sentences.chinese: 我思想我所行的道，就轉步歸向你的法度。

sentences.english: Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous and very faithful.
sentences.chinese: 你所命定的法度，是憑公義和至誠。

sentences.english: Let those that fear thee turn unto me, and those that have known thy testimonies.
sentences.chinese: 願敬畏你的人歸向我，他們就知道你的法度。

sentences.english: The wicked are waiting to destroy me, but I will ponder your statutes.
sentences.chinese: 惡人等待我，要滅絕我，我卻要揣摩你的法度。

sentences.english: But they put God to the test and rebelled against the Most High; they did not keep his statutes.
sentences.chinese: 他們仍舊試探悖逆至高的神，不守他的法度。

sentences.english: Concerning thy testimonies, I have known of old that thou hast founded them for ever.
sentences.chinese: 我因學你的法度，久已知道是你永遠立定的。

sentences.english: I rejoice in following your statutes as one rejoices in great riches.
sentences.chinese: 我喜悅你的法度，如同喜悅一切的財物。

sentences.english: I will speak of thy testimonies also before kings, and will not be ashamed.
sentences.chinese: 我也要在君王面前，論說你的法度，並不至於羞愧。

sentences.english: Long ago I learned from your statutes that you established them to last forever.
sentences.chinese: 我因學你的法度，久已知道是你永遠立定的。

sentences.english: This approach also helps to avoid overgeneralization in an application.
sentences.chinese: 這種辦法也有助於避免一個應用法度的過度一般化。

definition: lit. carpenter's straight line marker/same as 墨斗/fig. rules/rules and regulations
compasses, set square and straight line marker (idiom); fig. established standard/norms/criteria
